name: rent-a-bike/backend
description: Backend da aplicação Rent-A-Bike para gerenciamento de locações e devoluções.

scripts.db:e: docker exec -i rentabike-db mariadb -u root -proot < src/Database/rent-a-bike.sql
scripts.db:seed: docker exec -i rentabike-db mariadb -u root -proot < src/Database/db_mock.sql
scripts.db:relatorio: docker exec -i rentabike-db mariadb -u root -proot < src/Database/rent_a_bike_relatorio.sql
scripts.db: composer run db:e && composer run db:seed
